Class DiscreteTransform

java.lang.Object
DiscreteTransform
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscreteCosineTransform, DiscreteFourierTransform
public abstract class DiscreteTransform
extends java.lang.Object
Since:
06-12-2020 Midterm Project - 161044036 It is the class used to indicate Discrete Transforms. DFT and DFC derive from this class.
Author:
Furkan Ozev
